thread.title: Exclusive–Rep. Mark Meadows: I Promised President Trump I Would Negoitate Obamacare Repeal-Replace in Good Faith
thread.title_full: Exclusive–Rep. Mark Meadows: I Promised President Trump I Would Negoitate Obamacare Repeal-Replace in Good Faith

author: Neil W. McCabe
title: Exclusive–Rep. Mark Meadows: I Promised President Trump I Would Negoitate Obamacare Repeal-Replace in Good Faith
text: Chairman of the House Freedom Caucus Rep. Mark Meadows (R.-N.C.) told Breitbart News on Friday that he will work with moderate Republicans to pass better Obamacare repeal-and-replace legislation than the bill offered by Speaker Paul Ryan (R.-Wis.) -- as part of his understanding with President Donald Trump.
